name: Outsider (Northern Cupids Studio)
description:
Outsider

The game by genre is a puzzle with action elements. The game takes place in a laboratory, where the player will need to get out. During the escape, the player will learn the history of the laboratory, as well as meet local residents.

The player will perform the following actions to survive and get out of the lab:

1. Explore the location.

2. To solve the puzzle.

3. Be extremely careful and attentive.

The main features of the game are:

1. Partial absence of the user interface.

2. Unique inventory.

3. Puzzles based on object physics and interactivity with the world.

During the escape, the player will face different types of enemies

The project description will be updated

At the moment, you can see the demo version, but a little later.

What is the demo version?

The demo version is a small level where you need to solve several puzzles. Also in the demo version is an approximate graphics of the game.

In the future we will publish posts with the results of our activities)

Your support inspires us.
